Buckwheat Bulgar Bread

Buckwheat Bulgar Bread

serves 4 to 6

1 cup milk

Microwave together 1 minute

2 T honey

2 T hemp hearts

2 T buckwheat

2 T Bulgar

7 grams yeast

Sprinkle over top of milk grain mixture

5 grams salt


300g whole wheat flour
